backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing children, letters, and photos with add/get methods and sortable photo queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Indonesian‑localization features and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten map of frontend file paths to short human‑readable summaries used for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining light and dark color tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating theme, sections, navigation, share‑param parsing, and lightbox rendering.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Animat: Component animating letter text reveal character‑by‑character unless reduced‑motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Custom: Customization form for editing names, headline, details, notes, and generating share links.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Detail: Displays optional date, place, and note cards or a fallback message if no details exist.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Renders floating decorative accent images unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FlowNa: Provides a bottom navigation bar for switching between app sections.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Galler: Displays an uploaded photo gallery with removal and lightbox activation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/IntroS: Shows the intro screen with names and buttons to reveal or customize the page.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Letter: Handles previewing and editing love letters with selectable templates.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Lightb: Full-screen photo lightbox with navigation and captions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PhotoU: Uploads images with type and size validation and adds them to the gallery.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reduce: Toggle switch to enable or disable reduced-motion mode.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Reveal: Animated reveal screen showing the headline and navigation to letter or gallery.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Wrapper component adding a transition container around its children.
frontend/src/components/valentine/ThemeO: Renders background patterns and ornamental frames for page styling.
frontend/src/content/islamicLetterTempla: Provides predefined Islamic-themed love letter templates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup and exposing login state and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a sample React Query hook that fetches all photos via an actor if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Implements a Zustand store and hook to track and respond to system reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareLink.ts: Generates and copies a personalized share URL based on configured names, with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, custom color variables, fonts, and animation utilities for the app theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/state/useLoveLetterConfig.t: Zustand store managing all love letter customization fields, selected template, and current section.
frontend/src/state/usePhotoGallery.ts: Zustand store for managing a photo gallery including adding, removing, updating captions, and active photo state.
frontend/src/utils/shareQueryParams.ts: Parses from/to query parameters and generates shareable URLs that embed these values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, current feature set, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine-style customizable webpage.
